entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Subsequent hostedServices are not getting started with StartAsync #78135
  • [.Net7] Json deserialization regression: The value of the '$id' metadata property '93' conflicts with an existing identifier. Path: $... | LineNumber: ... | BytePositionInLine: .... #78132
  • The frame times of my toy ray tracer increased from 24ms to 30ms #78127
  • [API Proposal]: DiagnosticListener support for testing #78125
  • crossgen2's `--compilebubblegenerics` causes live lock at app start (100% CPU usage) #78117
  • NativeAOT compiler assert on static abstract GVM #78116
  • "SYSLIB1045 Use GeneratedRegexAttribute" doesn't respect #ifdef regions #78115
    8.0.0
  • SYSLIB1045 Use GeneratedRegexAttribute replaces verbatim string with regular string #78113
  • Change Event Viewer Log Level Mapping for Debug and/or Trace #78112
  • Performance of my Maze Generator went from 2.1 seconds to 3.8 after upgrading to .NET 7.0 #78110
  • Docker Container: running c# on linux arm32 #78108
  • Host.CreateDefaultBuilder watch the program root directory #78100
  • S.T.J.JsonSerializer doesn't support properties marked with JsonRequiredAttribute that're initialized through ctor #78098
  • QuicListener AcceptConnectionAsync and OperationCanceledException #78096
  • Uri.IdnHost strange behaviour for long hosts #78094
  • Spurious AV in unoptimized prolog #78092
    8.0.0
  • Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject throws a TypeLoadException if the parameter has a covariant property. #78090
  • .net 7 cycles Performance slow #78089
  • ExecutionEngineException when hooking/detouring GetSysColor() #78086
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\0044\\nullable\\nullable.cmd #78083
    8.0.0
  • JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Fma_Vector256.Program.MultiplyAddSingle fails in consolidated Vector test on OSX #78079
    8.0.0
  • Autogenerated assembly version is set to false for ILLink #78076
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] Unify implementation of Weak References in all runtimes. #75587
    8.0.0
  • Feature Request: Auto-Vectorization #77617
  • [jitstress] nullref in DefaultMode_Missing_AllMethods_ReportsDiagnostic #77153
    8.0.0
  • Assembly resolution algorithm difference between .NET 6 and .NET 4.8 #78037
  • Tar: symbolic link targets outside extract dir #74140
    8.0.0
  • .Net 7 System.Text.Json: Deserialize<EcohomeSettings> throws "Deserialization of types without a parameterless constructor not supported" exception #78111
  • System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager package contains assemblies with inconsistent versions #77887
  • System.Text.Json throws ArgumentNullException and not JsonException when deserializing with missing required property if exception resources are stripped #78099
  • System.Management throw System.PlatformNotSupportedException: 'System.Management currently is only supported for Windows desktop applications.' #78104
  • "unmanaged memory" issue with dotnet 6 #77722
  • .net7 JSON serialization performance regression #78097
  • Source Genereate Error not provided by TypeInfoResolver of type 'MyJsonContext'. If using source generation, ensure that all root types passed to the serializer have been indicated with 'JsonSerializableAttribute', along with any types that might be serialized polymorphically. #77115
  • [jitstress-random] Assertion failed '((lclNode->gtFlags & GTF_VAR_DEF) != 0) && (((lclNode->gtFlags & GTF_VAR_USEASG) != 0) == !isFullDef)' #77975
  • Sporadic OpenSSL decryption fails for HttpClient responses #73610
    6.0.x
  • System.Net.Security.Tests.NegotiateAuthenticationKerberosTest asserts on Android #74708
    8.0.0
  • ServerNoEncryption_ClientRequireEncryption_NoConnect passes on Ubuntu 22.04 with message about error:0A0000C1:SSL routines::no shared cipher #74970
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Directed/nullabletypes/Desktop/boxunboxvaluetype_ro/boxunboxvaluetype_ro.sh #77661
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: ObjectDisposedException in System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.JSImportExportTest.JsImportTaskTypes #78017
    8.0.0
  • s390x: XxHash3Tests.Hash_OneShot_Expected and Hash_Streaming_Expected tests fail #78043
    8.0.0
  • GetAllNetworkInterfaces throws on Success on Android .NET 6 #77938
    6.0.x
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/General/Vector128/Vector128_ro/Vector128_ro.sh #78082
  • net7.0 `System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonWriter#WriteBase64String` requires `RefStructs` compiler feature VB.NET #78065
  • Long running test: SendMailAsync_CanBeCanceled_CancellationToken #73447
    7.0.0
  • JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Fma_Vector256.Program.MultiplyAddSingle fails in consolidated Vector test on OSX #78081
  • JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Fma_Vector256.Program.MultiplyAddSingle fails in consolidated Vector test on OSX #78080
  • VC++ debug errors in mscordaccore on main #78019
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Azure Pipelines build badge in README #78134
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Add Vector128.AndNot intrinsics #78133
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 8.0.0
  • Transform `STRUCT`-typed uses of primitives in local morph #78131
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix expensive typo in JsonNode #78130
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Bring back fabricbot changes #78129
    area-Meta
  • Add REAMDE.md for ServiceProcess.ServiceController #78124
    area-System.ServiceProcess
  • [release/7.0] Fix Binding with IList<>, ICollection and IDictionary<,> implementer types #78118
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [release/7.0] JIT: fix gc hole in peephole optimizations #78109
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Restrict named mutex files permissions #78106
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix a typo. #78105
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix non-determinism in Regex source generator #78103
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add IndexOfAnyValues #78093
    area-System.Memory, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Fix support for generic custom attributes. #78091
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use TaskDialog for error dialog in Windows GUI apps #78087
    area-Host
  • Fix wrong condition check #78085
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `AppDomainIterator` #78078
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Linker into runtime2 #78077
    NO-MERGE, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Bump consumed dependency of Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility #78119
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #78051
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Linker into runtime diff2 #78049
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Split and simplify `fgMorphOneAsgBlockOp` #76793
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: fix gc hole in peephole optimizations #78074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages (backport of #75597) #77509
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Don't generate a nearly empty file #77187
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.x
  • Revert changes to fabricbot.json #78126
    area-Meta
  • Add README.md for System.Drawing.Primitives #78123
    area-System.Drawing
  • Add README.md for System.Drawing.Common #78121
    area-System.Drawing
  • Fixed clang15 build issues #78102
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-ppc64le
  • Update area tizen owners #78095
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Upgrade dotnet version needed to build benchmarks in superpmi #78088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #78057
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Fix Configuration with IList and ICollection #77857
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Update framework to net8.0 for perf-job. #78012
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Implement Vector128.Abs intrinsics #78067
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix XxHash3 DeriveSecretFromSeed scalar fallback on big endian #78084
    area-System.IO
  • Fix build error due to unused windowSize parameter in pal_console.c #78056
    area-System.Console, 8.0.0
  • Sync linker to NativeAOT #77894
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Exclude unnecessary functions/fields when FEATURE_METADATA_EMIT_IN_DEBUGGER #78058
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Pass NodeFactory to ObjectData's Section #77967
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update `GTF_VAR_USEASG` in the GS transformation #78028
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [main] Disable NativeAOT subset for source-build. (#76206) #78060
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix an issue with Vector<T>.Multiply #78021
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Use forattributename jsgenerator #78136
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Change regMask_enum and regMaskTP to unsigned __int64_t on AMD64. #77571
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Allocate boxed static structs on Frozen Object Heap #77737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Make Frozen collections tests pass with NativeAOT #78005
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reduce host memory usage: don't keep resolved deps around for app lifetime #77987
    area-Host, 8.0.0
  • Fix relative symlink support in TarFile #77338
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] TAR: Trim file type bits from mode header #77612
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 7.0.1
  • [JIT] X64 - Minor optimizations for arithmetic and `not` / `neg` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification #77386
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add a VN-based dead store removal phase #77990
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete a bit more `OBJ(ADDR(...))` wrapping from `impNormStructVal` #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Return NULL for mmap fail case on Unix #78069
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Suppress warnings for deprecated keychain APIs #77926
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, 6.0.x
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, test-enhancement
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix CngKey.KeySize for keys in the Platform Crypto Provider #77809
    area-System.Security
  • Adds readme for more extension items #77865
    area-Meta
  • [mono] MiniJIT OP_XEQUAL for floats #77770
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes, do_jit_call, and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #77794
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Subject src-gen serializer to full number-handling tests #78010
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Fix EC curve name case sensitivity on Windows #77801
    area-System.Security
  • WIP: Clean near unmaintainable parallel logic 53593 #76949
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Cleanup unmaintainable parallel logic with workers #77993
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Clean-up `Microsoft.Win32.Registry` and remove the non-Windows code. #77996
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Updating CreateScalar to be intrinsic for Vector64/128/256 #77798
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for CV path. #78044
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Normalize SIMD comparisons #78027
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend ProcessStartInfo to allow setting LOGON_NETCREDENTIALS_ONLY #77637
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Lazy init of [JSExport] bindings #77293
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add simple Else conditions to If Conversion #77728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    arch-arm64, os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix a few recent perf regressions in Regex #78003
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Prefer OutputRid over PackageRID for output artifacts. #76871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Don't copy coreclr version of coreclr and SPCL to core_root when targeting mono #76890
    area-Infrastructure
  • `ComputeManagedAssembliesToCompileToNative`: Make `microsoft.netcore.app` check case-insensitive. #78022
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use `init-os-and-arch.sh` in mono samples recipes #78055
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Enable software writewatch and card bundles on Windows. #77934
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior; Make the Utf8JsonWriter always insert newlines between the end of comments and the start of arrays or objects #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • Introduce OptLevel() in jit #77465
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] [NativeAOT-LLVM]: Unable to compile native WebAssembly library #2073
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Split RyuJit backend code into different files #2072

PullRequests

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Turn on optimisation in RyuJit module, partial support for FIELD_LIST and lowering promoted fields #2007
  • More stackwalking fixes #2068
  • Fix stack corruption bug on green threads #2070

Updated

  • Filament/prolog debug #2069
  • Fix a few things regarding EC, await, and thread pool local queuing #2067

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet test -r does not fallback on --results-directory anymore #28986
  • `dotnet test` cannot handle MSBuild command line arguments #28983
  • .NET 7 - Segmentation Fault on BeagleBone Black (arm32) #28982
  • Ability to update sdk (ie version 6.0.306 -> 6.0.403) and install new versions (7) from cli #28977
  • .NET 7.0.100 `dotnet test` cannot parse .rsp file if .NET CLI language is not EN #28975
  • Central event fired when a debugging breakpoint is hit and process pauses #28974
  • VS 17.4.0 Error "pack Microsoft.Android is not installed" #28972
  • Workload installation failed: No space left on device #28962
    Discussion

Closed

  • BuildX for arm64 on .Net 7.0 is broken #28971
  • The --launch-profile option of `dotnet run` and `dotnet watch run` should fallback to a case-insensitive match if a case-sensitive match isn't found #25868
    7.0.2xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Retarget Microsoft.Extensions.DotNetDeltaApplier to netstandard2.1 #28984
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #28979
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #28978
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce Roslyn-based GenAPI #28967
    Area-GenAPI
  • Deps.json should include project references that aren't present in project.assets.json #28963
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #28950
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #28944
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #28945
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #28961
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2041551 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Backport Add Blazor SWA Baseline Mismatched Assets Logging #28894
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Make all public API in dotnet-watch.dll internal and sealed. #28260
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch
  • Use architecture specific DOTNET_ROOT variable name #27566
    Area-Infrastructure, feature-dotnetwatch, Area-CLI, Area-Watch
  • Update to the RTM version of 7.0 #28949
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle test parser forwarded args #27961
    Area-DotNet Test, Area-CLI, cli-ux, 7.0.1xx
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Backport Add Blazor SWA Baseline Mismatched Assets Logging #28893
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/6.0.1xx] ResolveReadyToRunCompilers: map non-portable rids when targetOS is determined (backport #28380) #28782
    Servicing-consider, Area-ReadyToRun
  • Template verifier adoption in CommonTemplateTests #28707
    Area-dotnet new, Area-Common templates
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28930
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28948
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Proposal: Simplify redirection property to reduce boilerplate code #6675

PullRequests

Created

  • Correct example in params working group notes #6679
  • Nullability improvements notes 2022-11-07 #6674

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 'Use pattern matching' should prefer 'Coalesce with throw expression' #65323
  • VS incorrectly report a build as succeeded when a Roslyn code generator warning CS8785 treated as error fails the build #65313
    17.5
  • F1 help on `switch` keywords always opens documentation about switch statements #65312
  • F1 on `unmanaged` and `notnull` constraints leads to completely unrelated documentation #65311
  • EE binding should fall back to dynamic instead of giving a lookup error #65310
  • Update pattern matching analyzer to additional case #65308
  • Unexpected nullability warning for pattern matching control flow #65306
    17.5
  • error VSTHRD010 errors are not displayed in the error list (17.4.0 RTM) #65304
  • Re-enable support in LSP code actions for creating files. #65303
  • `Fix return type` introduces compiler error #65302
  • `DocumentationCommentId.CreateDeclarationId` always appends method return type #65301
  • Rename UI: highlighting span doesn't shrink when the new name is shorter #65299
  • Question: nuget package release schedule #65295
  • Add using tried adding a nonsensical extern alias in interactive #65294
  • Remove `ParameterSymbol.EffectiveScope` and use `DeclaredScope` and `HasUnscopedRefAttribute` instead #65293

Closed

  • "IDE0002 C# Name can be simplified." suggestion is longer #55595
    Backlog
  • Implementation of MethodSymbol IsIterator/IteratorElementTypeWithAnnotations APIs is fragile and violates symbol's design principle #40014
  • Codefix for CS1997 uses `Task<T>` even if the original return type was not `Task` #64901
    Backlog
  • Exception in `ChangeSignatureCodeRefactoringProvider` after wrong automatic closing brace placement #65298
  • Analyzer to enforce "Async" suffix on methods returning tasks #65309
  • Not handling all combinations of named enum values and booleans should give a CS8509 warning regardless of order, even if warnings are disabled for CS8524 #64698
    17.5
  • "Create and initialize property" should understand "NotImplementedException" #36998
    Backlog
  • Crash when trying to navigate with Inheritance Margin #65296
  • Error returning default value for a nullable type from a generic method. #64994
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure the causing syntax node is always in the timing dictionary #65321
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Ensure emit layer doesn't ignore diagnostics and dependencies for well known members. #65320
    Area-Compilers
  • Wait for search control API instead of 1 sec #65319
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Semantic snippets - don't need to add fully qualified name in syntax generation #65318
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65317
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix Package Dependencies #65315
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enhances the set of cases 'use pattern matching' works for. #65314
    Area-IDE
  • Gate defaults/`params` delegate type inference breaking change on langversion #65300
    Area-Compilers
  • Move lsp CodeActions handler down to LSP layer from editor layer. #65292
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Consistently return the same value from MethodSymbol.IteratorElementTypeWithAnnotations API #65291
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix null ref in change signature. #65307
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65316
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Inline Diagnostics - add null check #65283
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Incremental generator nodes must run when no result history #65223
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65265
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix "Fix return type" codefix for non-Task awaitable types #65305
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Fix generators not being added or removed correctly #65038
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Allow 'initialize property' to recognize simple throwing properties. #65235
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add more lambda defaults/`params` tests #65214
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid infinite loop in Find All References #65009
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add lambda defaults/`params` conversion warnings #64961
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix inheritance margin crash #65288
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets - else snippet #65178
    Area-IDE
  • Move some severity configurations to globalconfig #65274
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Is pattern expression with in parameter avoid unnecessary temp in rewriter #65243
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix ArgumentNullException under a race condition in analyzer driver #65083
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, OnDeckForServicing
  • Report structural lambda `params` errors #64960
    Area-Compilers
  • Re-enable navigate-to streaming with IAsyncEnumerable. #65244
    Area-IDE
  • 17.4: Convert symbol-search crash to NFW #65280
    Area-IDE
  • Refine error recovery in the parser around top level statements #65262
    Area-Compilers
  • Report analyzer telemetry for lightbulb code path in OOP #65212
    Area-Analyzers
  • Allow [UnscopedRef] annotation for ref and in parameters #65153
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TypeResults metadata are not inferred for API Controllers #44988
  • Support Declarative Shadow DOM in Razor/Blazor files #44986
  • [WIP] ASP.NET Core Roadmap for .NET 8 #44984
    8.0
  • MapBackgroundJob for Minimal APIs #44983
  • Blazor compatibilty with Wisej using custom elements #44982
  • net7 Blazor WASM AAD authentication ends with There was an error trying to log you in: '"undefined" is not valid JSON' #44981
  • Perf improvement: json, single_query #44980
  • Limit Buffering in ConnectionHandler while forwarding Data? #44975
  • Allow Blazor components with [Parameter] attributes on properties to be aware of the required modifier. #44974
  • TypedResults method no exist HttpContext #44970
  • UseHttpsRedirection: A post request on http redirects to get #44967
  • DefaultAuthenticationConfigurationProvider has new dependency on IConfiguration #44966
    8.0-preview1
  • Blazor WASM app fails to launch with 7.0 runtime and 6.0.10 packages #44963
  • ASPNetCore v7.0.0 failing to build: Missing NuGet's #44962
  • Invalid SignalR version with blazor server #44961
  • ASP.Net Core 7 Program.cs throws exception with Serilog log path #44958
  • Blazor @bind:after not working on .NET 7 RTM release #44957

Closed

  • Blazor JS Interop is bugged in an hard to reproduce scenario. #44927
    Backlog
  • PersistentComponentState: large state will crash the client, unable to recover #44935
  • ASP.NET Core Roadmap for .NET 7 #39504
    7.0.0
  • Regression, Blazor WASM OIDC login callback to not sent to the requested page #44973
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, plaintext #44923
  • Perf regression: json, json, plaintext_actix #44924
  • Perf regression: plainTextSansFilter #44931
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, plaintext #44948
  • No cleanup of rootcomponent #44928
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Visual Studio Application Insights (Visual Studio only) feature not working at all #44938
  • Github Actions Azure App Service Deployment Says Successful, But Nothing Deploys .Net 6.0 #44896
  • Dispose references when performing js-to-blazor interop #44960
  • Blazor Server Razor Component hides the Exception caused by Dispose() #44965
  • AzureAD.WebSite.csproj and CreateDefaultBuilderApp.csproj don't exist in AspNetCore.sln #31436
  • Blazor WASM, Unhandled exception rendering component: ExpectedStartOfValueNotFound on login after published #44934
  • ASP0014: Suggest using top level route registrations #44959
  • GeneratePackageOnBuild with TypeScript throws error #44911
  • Using an expression to set a @on{EVENT}:preventDefault value in an SVG throws exception when expression changes from true to false #25297
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF core 7 build generates warnings #29525
  • How to ensure there is only one key pair in a many-to-many relation? #29524
  • SQLite: Exception when using enum on entity #29521
  • [SQLite] AUTOINCREMENT not emitted for primary key with value conversion #29519
  • ValueGenerated and ValueGeneratedSensitive have property/entity type swapped in message #29517
  • EFcore 7 scaffolding exception #29516
  • SQLite Error 5: 'database is locked' during writing from two DB connections #29514
  • Json: improve projection deduplication for scenarios containing collection indexers #29513
  • SQLite: RETURNING clause doesn't work with virtual tables #29512
  • How does efcore implement full join #29511

Closed

  • Further improvements to design-time method call generation #25498
  • EFCore 3.1 - SqlServer - Using ToString() on string column gives invalid LINQ error. #20839
    8.0.0
  • ExecuteUpdate does not work with owned entities #29483
  • Make `IDatabaseModelFactory` always be an open api? #29515
  • EfCore 6: string.IndexOf throws NullReferenceException when applied on the result of a DbFunction #29204
    6.0.12
  • EF Core 7 throws System.Reflection.ReflectionTypeLoadException #29510

PullRequests

Created

  • Add test for ExecuteUpdate with two inner joins #29522
  • Proposed fix to #7172 - Consider non-default column collation in table variable #29518

Merged

  • ToString() on string columns added #29349
    community-contribution
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #29506

Updated

  • Fix to #17066 - Query: Translate ElementAt(OrDefault) #29496
  • Fix to #29365 - Query/Test: convert FromSql tests to use query infra #29402
    auto-merge
  • Don't duplicate query filter parameters #29422
  • feat: normalize migrations file #28367
